trans-unit.source: Contains properties and methods to provide consistent look and feel to all root designers on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 包含屬性和方法，可為工作流程設計介面上的所有根目錄設計工具提供一致的外觀及操作。

trans-unit.source: Typically, an instance of a sequential workflow root designer class is created when a workflow is created in a workflow designer and it represents the designer surface on which users can add and edit activities.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，當在工作流程設計工具中建立工作流程時，便會建立一個循序工作流程根目錄設計工具類別的執行個體，而這個執行個體即表示使用者可以在上面新增和編輯活動的設計工具介面。

trans-unit.source: A workflow root designer does not have a parent designer unless it is the child of an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程根目錄設計工具沒有父設計工具，除非其為 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity> 活動的子系。

trans-unit.source: All workflow root designers must derive from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: 所有的工作流程根目錄設計工具都必須衍生自 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> to check.
trans-unit.target: 要進行檢查的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> can be set as the parent of the activity associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值表示 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> 是否可以設定為與設計工具關聯之活動的父系。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to allow the activity associated with <paramref name="parentActivityDesigner" /> to be the parent of the activity associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果允許與 <see langword="true" /> 關聯的活動可以成為與 <paramref name="parentActivityDesigner" /> 關聯之活動的父系則為 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Root designers cannot have a parent activity designer on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 根目錄設計工具在工作流程設計介面上不可以有父活動設計工具。

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in an inheriting class, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.CanBeParentedTo%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 除非在繼承類別中覆寫，否則 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.CanBeParentedTo%2A> 會傳回 `false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer can be expanded and collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示設計工具是否可以展開和摺疊。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" /> can be expanded and collapsed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 可以展開和摺疊則為 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a deriving class, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.CanExpandCollapse%2A> is always set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 除非在衍生類別中覆寫，否則 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.CanExpandCollapse%2A> 會永遠設為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the footer associated with the root designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得與根目錄設計工具關聯的頁尾。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> that represents the footer associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" />，表示與 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" /> 關聯的頁尾。

trans-unit.source: The contents of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Footer%2A> appear at the bottom of the root designer on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Footer%2A> 的內容會顯示在工作流程設計介面中之根目錄設計工具的底部。

trans-unit.source: Icons and text can be displayed in the footer, including button icons that change the designer view when a user selects one of them.
trans-unit.target: 圖示和文字會顯示在頁尾，包括按鈕圖示，當使用者選取其中一個時即可改變設計工具檢視。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges" /> on which to gather the collection of connection points.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中收集連線點集合的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of points that represent the inner connection of the designer.
trans-unit.target: 傳回點唯讀集合，表示設計工具的內部連線。

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> objects used for a connectable designer.
trans-unit.target: 包含做為可連接設計工具之 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: A designer can have connectors within it.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具內部可以有接點。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of glyphs that are displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得圖像 (Glyph) 集合，這些圖像會顯示在 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" /> 中。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection" /> that contains the glyphs displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection" />，其中包含顯示在 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" /> 中的圖像。

trans-unit.source: Gets the header associated with the root designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得與根目錄設計工具相關聯的頁首。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> that represents the header associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" />，表示與 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" /> 相關聯的頁首。

trans-unit.source: The contents of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A> appear at the top of the root designer on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A> 的內容會顯示在工作流程設計介面中之根目錄設計工具的頂端。

trans-unit.source: Icons and text can be displayed in the header, including text that indicates the designer view that is currently displayed on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 圖示和文字會顯示在頁首，包括指出目前顯示在設計介面上之設計工具檢視的文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets the image associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得與設計工具關聯的影像。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to associate with the designer.
trans-unit.target: 與設計工具關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Image%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> to display.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Image%2A> 屬性設定為要顯示的 <xref:System.Drawing.Image>。

trans-unit.source: You can do this at design time or at run time.
trans-unit.target: 您可在設計階段或執行階段時設定。

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a derived class, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Image%2A> returns a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 除非在衍生類別中覆寫，否則 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Image%2A> 會傳回 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value for the enclosing bounds of the image associated with the designer in logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 取得影像包圍界線的邏輯座標值，這個影像則與設計工具相關聯。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that encloses the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> displayed for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，會將針對 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 所顯示的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />包圍起來。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.ImageRectangle%2A> to retrieve the coordinates for the rectangle that encloses the image associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: 請使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.ImageRectangle%2A> 擷取包圍與設計工具相關聯之影像的矩形座標。

trans-unit.source: You can use these coordinates for drawing connectors or overlaying graphics.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這些座標來繪製接點或覆疊圖形。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.ImageRectangle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範如何覆寫 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.ImageRectangle%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.ImageRectangle%2A> is calculated using the Bounds of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: 在這個範例中將使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.ImageRectangle%2A><xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>的繫結計算 。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> that requested the sequential workflow root designer to be initialized.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />，它會要求初始化循序工作流程根目錄設計工具。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> that requested the workflow root designer to be initialized.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />，它會要求初始化工作流程根目錄設計工具。

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum size for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" /> 的最小大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the minimum size of the sequential workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，表示循序工作流程設計工具的最小大小。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.MinimumSize%2A> represents the smallest size to which a user can resize the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.MinimumSize%2A> 表示使用者可以將 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner> 調整成的最小大小。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the layout arguments.
trans-unit.target: 包含配置引數的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the size of the visual cues on the designers contained within the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" /> 中內含的設計工具上，設定視覺提示的大小。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the size of the visual cues on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" /> 上視覺提示的大小。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Draws any headers and footers associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 繪製與 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" /> 相關聯的頁首和頁尾。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.OnPaint%2A> draws any text to include in the headers and footers with the appropriate theme settings.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.OnPaint%2A> 會使用適當的主題設定繪製任何要包含在頁首和頁尾的文字。

trans-unit.source: It also draws any images to include in the headers and footers.
trans-unit.target: 它也會繪製任何要包含在頁首和頁尾的影像。

trans-unit.source: **Note** When you override <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.OnPaint%2A> in a derived class, be sure to call the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnPaint%2A> method of the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: **請注意**當您覆寫<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.OnPaint%2A>在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnPaint%2A>方法的基底類別，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> 包含 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display smart tags on the designer surface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在設計工具上顯示智慧標籤則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer whether smart tags are to be shown or hidden on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示或隱藏 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" /> 中的智慧標籤時，通知設計工具。

trans-unit.source: When called, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged%2A> invalidates the text rectangle associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 當呼叫時，<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged%2A> 會使與 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A> 關聯的文字矩形失效。

trans-unit.source: **Note** When you override <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged%2A> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged%2A> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: **請注意**當您覆寫<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged%2A>在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged%2A>方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the root designer displays smart tags.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示根目錄設計工具是否要顯示智慧標籤。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" /> displays smart tags; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" /> 顯示智慧標籤則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A> property is not set to a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) and the corresponding <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Text%2A> property is not an empty string or set to a null reference (`Nothing`), <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.ShowSmartTag%2A> returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A> 屬性不是設為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`) 而且對應的 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Text%2A> 屬性不是空字串或設為 null 參考 (`Nothing`)，<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.ShowSmartTag%2A> 會傳回 `true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle on the designer surface in which to display a smart tag.
trans-unit.target: 取得要在設計工具介面上顯示智慧標籤的矩形。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that defines the bounds in which to display the smart tag.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，定義要在其中顯示智慧標籤的邊界。

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.ShowSmartTag%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.SmartTagVerbs%2A> to display a smart tag of available <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.DesignerActions%2A> at the location specified by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.SmartTagRectangle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.ShowSmartTag%2A> 和 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.SmartTagVerbs%2A> 在 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.DesignerActions%2A> 指定的位置上顯示 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.SmartTagRectangle%2A> 可用的智慧標籤。

trans-unit.source: Gets the description associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得與設計工具相關聯的描述。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the description associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含與設計工具相關聯的描述。

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in an inheriting class, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Text%2A> returns <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 除非在繼承類別中覆寫，否則 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Text%2A> 會傳回 <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the title area of the designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得設計工具標題區域的高度。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the height of the title area of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 整數，表示 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" /> 標題區域的高度。

trans-unit.source: A root designer title area typically contains the header and any icon associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: 根目錄設計工具的標題區域通常包含標頭以及與設計工具相關聯的任何圖示。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.TitleHeight%2A> calculates the integer it returns by getting the value of its base implementation and adding the height integer defined for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.TitleHeight%2A> 會計算其傳回的整數，方法是取得其基底實作的值並加入為 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A> 定義的高度整數。
